tdmtpy.tensor.Tensor.decompose¶

Tensor.decompose()[source]¶

Moment tensor decomposition

A function that decomposes the moment tensor from attribute m and assigns the result to various other attributes. Refer to Tensor for the full list of variables after decomposition.
